snippet: Carl Weisbrod will co-lead Bill de Blasio’s transition team after being a central figure in changing the face of Times Square and the financial district.
abstract: Carl Weisbrod, who will co-chair New York City Mayor-elect Bill de Blasio’s transition team, has been a central figure in changing the face of Times Square and the financial district; he has by far been in and around city government longer than anyone on the team.
lead_paragraph: Carl Weisbrod will co-lead Bill de Blasio’s transition team after being a central figure in changing the face of Times Square and the financial district.

headline.main: Weisbrod Brings Long Résumé to Advise the Mayor-Elect
headline.print_headline: Atop de Blasio’s Transition Team, Two Leaders With Roots in Social Justice: He Brings Long Résumé to Advise the Mayor-Elect
